steps.name: user loads the API with the "loginpayload"
user calls the post http method with "loginAPI"
user should see the response as 200
user loads the addproductAPI with the payload
user calls the post http method with "addProductAPI"
user should see the response as 201
user loads the API with the "Createorderpayload"
user calls the post http method with "createOrderAPI"
user should see the response as 201
user loads the API with the "Delorderpayload"
